title: Chatty App (MERN Real-time Chat App)
description: Chatty is a real-time full-stack messaging app built with the MERN stack and Socket.IO. It supports private chats, real-time notifications, Firebase Authentication, and a modern UI built with React, Tailwind CSS, and responsive design principles.

title: Drive with Raj (Car E-commerce Platform)
description: Drive with Raj is a premium car e-commerce platform built using React, Firebase Authentication, Firestore, and Storage. It allows users to buy, sell, and explore luxury vehicles with live data sync and a modern UI inspired by CarDekho.

title: Chatty App Frontend
description: The frontend version of Chatty built using React.js and Firebase Auth. It features real-time design, a friendly chat UI, and smooth routing powered by Tailwind CSS.

title: QR Code Generator
description: A handy QR Code generator built with React and a public API. Users can instantly convert any link or text into a downloadable QR code with responsive styling.

title: React E-Commerce Frontend
description: A stylish React-based e-commerce frontend UI showcasing shoes and other products. Features include category browsing, dynamic routing, and a clean, modern design.
